welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lanus, Argentina! This vibrant city is known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and delicious culinary scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Lanus has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Ezeiza Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Ezeiza Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Plata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Plata Airport, serving only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
